title: [BUG] Pointer-Events not working on SKXamlCanvas on iOs and Android
body:
**Description**
I have a control inherited from SKXamlCanvas and attach event-handlers there for these events:

- PointerPressed
- PointerMoved
- PointerReleased
- PointerExited
- PointerCaptureLost
- Tapped
- DoubleTapped

But none of those gets triggered on iOs and Android. On Windows/WinUI it is working as expected.

**Expected Behavior**
The events should get raised.
<!-- a general description of what was the expected behavior or result -->

**Actual Behavior**
The events don't get raised.
<!-- a general description of what really happened -->

**Basic Information**

- Version with issue:  SkiaSharp.Views.Uno.WinUI 2.88.1-preview.63
- IDE:  Visual Studio
